Our Next Event

Kaiju Days | Toy Con Edition

9/11 - 9/12 BRIDGEVIEW, IL Our Fall show, in partnership with Toy Con Toy Show! We’ll have an entire hall full of vendors & artists dedicated to Kaiju, Tokusatsu, and Japanese Pop Culture!

You can also check out the main show floor of Toy Con vendors, where you’ll find new and vintage goodies.

Show Hours

September 11: 4pm - 9pm
September 12: 8am - 2pm

Admission

$5 Adults
FREE Kids 10 & under

Location

Bridgeview Community Center
7900 South Oketo Avenue
Bridgeview, IL 60455
Event RSVP Our FB Page

About Us

KAIJU DAYS is a boutique pop-up event celebrating Japanese Monsters and Robots. Our dealers offer collectible toys, apparel, posters and original artwork. Come join the tribe!

KAIJU DAYS is hosted by @halfbakedfantasy & @otakumerica and will appear in random locations throughout Chicagoland and the Midwest.
